Selected University Briefs

A collectiong of various briefs I have worked on throughout university, looking at visual effects, videography and motion graphics.


Visual Effects

"The Subtle Knife" VFX Sequence

A short sequence for a concept film based on Philip Pullman's "The Subtle Knife". This was created for a module focussing on the importance of narrative on visual effects so I decided to take an excerpt from a book. The sequence showcases day-for-night effects, a particle portal and some 3D integration.


"Doors & Doors & Doors" VFX Sequence

A collaborative VFX sequence filmed with three of my peers. We decided to focus on invisible and seamless effects to sell the narrative more effectively, this includes set extension, rotoscoping and keying, crowd creation and compositing. See both the sequence and breakdown above.

Motion Graphics

Milieue Skateboards Advert

A motion graphics and live action focussed advert for a concept skateboard brand. This was shot and edited by myself within a five-day turnaround.


MINDFüLL Mental Health Campaign

Three short motion graphics that could be used for a mental health campaign at Edinburgh Napier University that would aim to increase engagement with their mental health advisors.


Kinetic Typography Study

One of my first studies in motion graphics and kinetic typography and could be used as a film opening sequence. This takes inspiration from some of my favourite albums and album covers.
